particlesystem_additive_transparent_part:
{
  "layer": "transparent",
  "queue": 0,
  "properties": [
    "_BasicColor('Basic Color', Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5)",
    "_SaturatedColor('Saturated Color', Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5)",

    "_MainTex('Particle Texture',Texture)='white'{}",
    "_ColorRamp('Color Ramp', Texture) = 'white' {}",
    "_NoiseTex('Noise Texture', Texture) = 'white' {}",

    "_EmissionSaturation('Emission saturation', Range(0.0, 8.0)) = 1.0",
    "_OpacitySaturation('Opacity saturation', Range(0.0, 8.0)) = 1.0",
    "_ColorMultiplier('Color multiplier', Range(0.0, 8.0)) = 1.0",
    "_ABOffset('Alpha blend offset', Range(0.0, 8.0)) = 0.0",
    
    "_DissolveStep('DissolveStep.xy', Vector) = (0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0)",
    
    "_Panning('Automatic Panning', Vector) = (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)",

    "_TintColor ('Tint Color', Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5)",
    "_GlobalAlpha('Global alpha', float) = 1.0",
    
    "_EmissivePower('Emissive Power', Range(1.0, 4.0)) = 1.0",
    "_NoisePanning('Noise Panning', Vector) = (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)",
    
    "COLOR_RAMP('COLOR_RAMP', float) = 0.0",
    "COLOR_TINT('COLOR_TINT', float) = 0.0",
    "APPLY_RGB_COLOR_VERTEX('APPLY_RGB_COLOR_VERTEX', float) = 0.0",
    "DISSOLVE_ENABLED('DISSOLVE_ENABLED', float) = 0.0",
    "AUTOMATICPANNING('AUTOMATICPANNING', float) = 0.0",
    "EMISSIVEPOWER('EMISSIVEPOWER', float) = 0.0",
    "EXTENDED_PARTICLES('EXTENDED_PARTICLES', float) = 0.0",
    "NOISE_TEXTURE('NOISE_TEXTURE', float) = 0.0",
    "NOISE_TEXTURE_EMISSION('NOISE_TEXTURE_EMISSION', float) = 0.0",
    "NOISE_TEXTURE_ALPHA('NOISE_TEXTURE_ALPHA', float) = 0.0",
    "NOISE_TEXTURE_DISSOLVE('NOISE_TEXTURE_DISSOLVE', float) = 0.0",
    "NOISEUV('NOISEUV', float) = 0.0",
    "FLOWMAP('FLOWMAP', float) = 0.0",
    "BlendMode('BlendMode', float) = 0.0"
  ],
  "passes": {
    "base": [
      {
        "blendmode": "add",
        "showface": "all",
        "zwrite": "off",
        "vs": "particlesystem_transparent_particles_standard",
        "fs": "particlesystem_transparent_particles_standard"
      }
    ],
    "base_fog": [
      {
        "blendmode": "add",
        "showface": "all",
        "zwrite": "off",
        "vs": "particlesystem_transparent_particles_standard",
        "fs": "particlesystem_transparent_particles_standard"
      }
    ],
    "shadowgen": [],
    "bone": [],
    "shadowuse": []
  }
}

sence01pubu.shader.json:
{
    "layer": "transparent",
    "properties": [
        "_RS ('RS', Range(0, 1)) = 0",
        "_GS ('GS', Range(0, 1)) = 0",
        "_BS ('BS', Range(0, 1)) = 0",
        "_RClose ('RClose', Float ) = 0",
        "_Gclose ('Gclose', Float ) = 0",
        "_Bclose ('Bclose', Float ) = 0",
        "_Rcolor ('Rcolor', Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,1)",
        "_Gcolor ('Gcolor', Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,1)",
        "_Bcolor ('Bcolor', Color) = (0.5,0.5,0.5,1)",
        "_R ('R', Texture) = 'white' {}",
        "_G ('G', Texture) = 'white' {}",
        "_B ('B', Texture) = 'white' {}",
        "_R_ST('_R_ST',Vector) = (1,1,0,0)",
        "_G_ST('_G_ST',Vector) = (1,1,0,0)",
        "_B_ST('_B_ST',Vector) = (1,1,0,0)"
    ],
    "passes": {
        "base": [
            {
                "blendmode": "blend",
                "zwrite": "off",
                "showface": "ccw",
                "vs": "sence01pubu",
                "fs": "sence01pubu"
            }
        ],
        "base_fog": [
            {
                "blendmode": "blend",
                "zwrite": "off",
                "showface": "ccw",
                "vs": "sence01pubu",
                "fs": "sence01pubu"
            }
        ]
    }
}
